thread.title: U.S. judge says 'emoluments' case against Trump can proceed

title: U.S. judge says 'emoluments' case against Trump can proceed
text:
U.S. judge says 'emoluments' case against Trump can proceed 12:22am BST - 02:02 
President Donald Trump’s legal troubles deepened on Wednesday as a federal judge refused to throw out a lawsuit accusing him of flouting constitutional safeguards against corruption by maintaining ownership of his business empire while in office. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
President Donald Trump’s legal troubles deepened on Wednesday as a federal judge refused to throw out a lawsuit accusing him of flouting constitutional safeguards against corruption by maintaining ownership of his business empire while in office.
